tei:p.tei:hi: Handwritten letter from Schenker to Cotta, dated November 24, 1906

tei:translation.tei:p: In my letter to you of yesterday, I forgot to note down which editorial offices the five reviewers belong to. Just so as to avoid the possibility of two copies being sent to the same office, I take the liberty of adding that they belong as follows:

Dr. Rob. Hirschfeld [–] to the „Wiener <strike>xxx</strike> Zeitung“ Dr. Julius Korngold [–] to the „N. Fr. Presse“ Max Kalbeck [–] to the „N. W. Tagblatt“ Ludwig Karpath [–] to the „N. W. Tagblatt“ Hans Liebstöckl [–] to the „Illustr. W. Extrablatt“
With kind regards, [ signed: ] H. Schenker November 24, 1906
